title: New: Foreign/National – Too Sentimental
body:
Hearing a really twisted Tame Impala meets Youth Lagoon vibe to this new track from Melbourne’s **Foreign/National**, all tied up with a gloriously upbeat, addictive chorus hook.

Arguably their finest moment to date, and hopefully an indicator of much more like this to come. Check out _Too Sentimental_ below.

excerpt.full: Hearing a really twisted Tame Impala meets Youth Lagoon vibe to this new track from Melbourne’s Foreign/National, all tied up with a gloriously upbeat, addictive chorus hook. Arguably their finest moment to date, and hopefully an indicator of much more like this to come. Check out Too Sentimental below.
